name: Knights of the Card Table
description: Master over 100 dungeons and 3 worlds in this dungeon crawler card game that puts YOU in control of the dungeon cards. Rearrange the dungeon cards to collect loot before rolling dice to slay foes with your nunchucks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Vista, or XP Service Pack 3 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems) Storage: 30 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 1.5 GHz processor Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 or higher (available in most modern Windows systems)
